trans-unit.target: Minimum size of a locally pinned volume/share

trans-unit.target: Maximum size of a locally pinned volume/share

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of access control records per device
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of access control records per device

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of backups retained by the virtual device in *.backups* folder for file server
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of backups retained by the virtual device in *.backups* folder for file server

trans-unit.source: This includes the most recent scheduled (generated by the default backup policy) and manual backups.
trans-unit.target: This includes the most recent scheduled (generated by the default backup policy) and manual backups.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of scheduled backups retained by the device
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of scheduled backups retained by the device

trans-unit.source: 30 daily backups
trans-unit.target: 30 daily backups

trans-unit.source: 12 monthly backups
trans-unit.target: 12 monthly backups

trans-unit.source: 13 yearly backups
trans-unit.target: 13 yearly backups

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of manual backups retained by the device
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of manual backups retained by the device

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of volumes that can be processed in parallel for backup or restore
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of volumes that can be processed in parallel for backup or restore

trans-unit.source: If there are more than 3 volumes, they will be processed sequentially as processing slots become available.
trans-unit.target: If there are more than 3 volumes, they will be processed sequentially as processing slots become available.

trans-unit.source: Restore recover time
trans-unit.target: Restore recover time

trans-unit.source: Quick restore
trans-unit.target: Quick restore

trans-unit.source: The restore is based on the heat map and is dependent on the volume size.
trans-unit.target: The restore is based on the heat map and is dependent on the volume size.

trans-unit.source: Backup operations can occur while a restore operation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: Backup operations can occur while a restore operation is in progress.
